title: Text of a Letter from the President to Certain Chairmen of House and Senate Committees on the Security and Stability Strategy for Somalia â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
December 14, 2018
Dear Mr. Chairman:In accordance with section 1271 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018 (Public Law 115-91), I transmit herewith a security and stability strategy for Somalia.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
